plot: Oh, this marriage thing. There's no fooling around, this time. Jack and Carly have both done this, before. He's done it once; she's been through it twice. This time is different, though. Together with his daughter, Nicole; her son, Will; her daughter, Sarah; and despite some annoying exes and hectic work schedules, they know that they've got something good, something special; something amazing; something so right.   Written by  David Levy

title: Todo va sobre ruedas (Something So Right)
